content:
Hi, everyone I'm Ray
I going to try to use this site and gonna post my cosplay pic in here
if you have any suggestion please tell me!!

For this photo of Hotarumaru I will post it as soon as possible
Please waiting for a while XD

Hope you will be like it!!

-----------------------------------------
你好，我是雷的每个人都
我要尝试使用此网站及会在这里发布我 cosplay pic
如果你有任何建议，请告诉我!!

对于这张照片的 蛍丸 我将发布它尽快
请等待一段时间 XD

希望你会喜欢它!!


蛍丸 cn: l2ayrina
